#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main() {
    int t, n, max_c, max_w, max_m, m, w, c;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    while (t--) {
        scanf("%d %d %d %d", &n, &m, &w, &c);
        max_c = 4 * n / 5;
        if (max_c > c)
            max_c = c;
        max_w = 2 * (n - max_c) / 3;
        if (max_w > w)
            max_w = w;
        max_m = n - max_w - max_c;
        if (max_m > m)
            max_m = m;
        if (max_w > max_m * 2)
            max_w = max_m * 2;
        if (max_c > (max_w + max_m) * 4)
            max_c = (max_w + max_m) * 4;
        printf("%d %d %d\n", max_m, max_w, max_c);
    }
    return 0;
}
